cards.text: accidentally join a cult
ask for the aux at a party
be an intense soccer parent
become a social media "influencer"

burp in a crowded room

elope with their partner of three weeks
fall for a call-center scam

get back with their ex
get banned from a bar
get canonized
get catfished by someone they met online
get denied by a bouncer because they look too young

get wrapped up in conspiracy theories
go an entire day with their zipper down
go vegan because it's "trendy"
have a docuseries made about their life
hire an escort for their highschool reunion

laugh in the middle of a funeral
lie about their age
live in a tiny house in the mountains

marry a drug lord
not say anything to a friend who has food in their teeth
not tell their parents that they have kids
outlive everyone in the room
not wear pants around the house
pretend to be gluten-free
quarantine for the rest of their lives
reinvent themselves in the next ten years
sleep until noon on a Monday
smoke weed with their kids
spell February wrong
spend over $5,000 on coffee in one year
stalk a celebrity

take public transportation to the hospital instead of calling an ambulence
tax evade
get buzzed after one glass of wine
bring in all of the groceries in one trip

break a Guinness World Record
yell at the TV while watching sports

fake it until they make it

be just like their parents

be a cool parent
